title: FS: Addie Joss (hands at chest) PSA 4 SCap 350/25, the only one!
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: FS: Addie Joss (hands at chest) PSA 4 SCap 350/25, the only one!
posts.post_content: I was going thru some cards and found this one that I completely forgot about. This is only one of two graded SCap 350 fact. 25 back of ALL grades according to PSA Pops report, extremely rare because this is a fairly high populated HOFer....Card is pretty well centered with slightly rounded corners, extremely clean back and presents extremely well. I can send pics to whoever needs them, going to sell it quick this weekend....First $350 gets it, thanks...
